techmeme.title: Bright Machines, which automates manufacturing with AI and robotics, raised a $126M Series C from Nvidia, Microsoft, and others, including $20M in debt (Max A. Cherney/Reuters)
k-ID, a platform that helps game developers comply with child safety and data privacy regulations, raised a $45M Series A led by a16z and Lightspeed (Kate Park/TechCrunch)
With an economy hobbled by Western sanctions and inflation, desperate Iranians are flocking to "tap-to-earn" crypto mini apps in Telegram like Hamster Kombat (Associated Press)
Etched, which is building Sohu, an inferencing chip that only runs transformer AI models, raised a $120M Series A, bringing its total funding to $125.36M (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Uber Freight will use Aurora's driverless trucks on routes between Dallas and Houston as part of a new long-term deal, following a three-year commercial pilot (Andrew J. Hawkins/The Verge)
